component.name: Verge
component.summary: Connect to the Verge P2P network

description.p: Verge Currency is an experimental digital currency that enables instant payments to anyone, anywhere in the world. Verge Currency uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network. Verge is the name of open source software which enables the use of this currency.
